history.proof: intros d sigma H. unfold dta_compat_check, dta_correct_wrt_sign in *. destruct d as [p a]. intros H'. apply predta_compat_check_complete. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_compat_check d sigma = true -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
dta_compat_check = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta p _ => predta_compat_check p sigma end : DTA -> signature -> bool
signature = Map nat : Set
Inductive DTA : Set := dta : preDTA -> ad -> DTA
dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature -> Prop
dta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_compat_check d sigma = true
predta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_compat_check d sigma = true
predta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_compat_check d sigma = true -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : DTA), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> dta_compatible d d'
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
predta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma : preDTA -> signature -> Prop
st_compat_check_correct : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> st_compat_check s sigma = true
st_compat_check_complete : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature), st_compat_check s sigma = true -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma
predta_compat_check = fix predta_compat_check (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) {struct d} : bool := match d with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ s => st_compat_check s sigma | @M2 _ x y => predta_compat_check x sigma && predta_compat_check y sigma end : preDTA -> signature -> bool
predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign (M2 state d0 d1) sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma /\ predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma
reconnait = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end : DTA -> term -> Prop
st_compat_check_0_correct : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa -> st_compat_check_0 pa sigma s = true
st_compat_check_0_complete : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), st_compat_check_0 pa sigma s = true -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa
invar_term = fun t : term => forall (n m : nat) (d : preDTA) (a : ad), rec_term d a t n = true -> n <= m -> rec_term d a t m = true : term -> Prop
dta_rec_term = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => rec_term p a t (essence t p) end : DTA -> term -> bool
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
states_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (s s' : state), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign s' sigma -> st_compatible s s'
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M2 prec_list s0 s1) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma (pre_ad_O pa) /\ state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s1 sigma (pre_ad_I pa)
st_compat_check = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => st_compat_check_0 pre_ad_empty sigma s : state -> signature -> bool
state_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => exists a : ad, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> state -> Prop
state_correct_wrt_sign = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma a = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> Prop
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> pre_ad -> Prop
st_compat_check_0 = fix st_compat_check_0 (pa : pre_ad) (sigma : signature) (s : state) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ a p => match pl_compat_check p with | Some n => match MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) with | Some m => n =? m | None => false end | None => false end | @M2 _ x y => st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_O pa) sigma x && st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_I pa) sigma y end : pre_ad -> signature -> state -> bool
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
rec_term = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d stp tl k end | prec_empty => match l with | tnil => true | tcons _ _ => false end end end for rec_term : preDTA -> ad -> term -> nat -> bool Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope]
Tauto.tauto_checker_sound : forall (Env Term Term' Annot : Type) (unsat : Term' -> bool) (deduce : Term' -> Term' -> option Term') (normalise negate : Term -> Annot -> Tauto.cnf Term' Annot) (eval : Env -> Term -> Prop) (eval' : Env -> Term' -> Prop), (forall (env : Env) (d : Term'), eval' env d \/ ~ eval' env d) -> (forall t : Term', unsat t = true -> forall env : Env, eval' env t -> False) -> (forall (env : Env) (t t' u : Term'), eval' env t -> eval' env t' -> deduce t t' = Some u -> eval' env u) -> (forall (env : Env) (t : Term) (tg : Annot), Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env (normalise t tg) -> eval env t) ->...-> forall env : Env, Tauto.eval_f (fun x : Prop => x) (eval env) t
Tauto.xcnf_correct : forall (Env Term Term' Annot : Type) (unsat : Term' -> bool) (deduce : Term' -> Term' -> option Term') (normalise negate : Term -> Annot -> Tauto.cnf Term' Annot) (eval : Env -> Term -> Prop) (eval' : Env -> Term' -> Prop), (forall (env : Env) (d : Term'), eval' env d \/ ~ eval' env d) -> (forall t : Term', unsat t = true -> forall env : Env, eval' env t -> False) -> (forall (env : Env) (t t' u : Term'), eval' env t -> eval' env t' -> deduce t t' = Some u -> eval' env u) -> (forall (env : Env) (t : Term) (tg : Annot), Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env (normalise t tg) -> eval env t) ->...-> Tauto.eval_f (fun x : Prop => x) (eval env) (if pol then f else Tauto.N f)
Tauto.cnf_checker_sound : forall (Env Term' Annot : Type) (eval' : Env -> Term' -> Prop) (Witness : Type) (checker : list (Term' * Annot) -> Witness -> bool), (forall (t : list (Term' * Annot)) (w : Witness), checker t w = true -> forall env : Env, Refl.make_impl (Tauto.eval_tt eval' env) t False) -> forall (t : Tauto.cnf Term' Annot) (w : list Witness), Tauto.cnf_checker checker t w = true -> forall env : Env, Tauto.eval_cnf eval' env t
orb_true_intro : forall b1 b2 : bool, b1 = true \/ b2 = true -> b1 || b2 = true
Nmin_le_5 : forall a b c : N, Nleb a b = true -> Nleb a c = true -> Nleb a (N.min b c) = true
essence = fun (t : term) (d : preDTA) => S (term_high t) * S (DTA_taille d) : term -> preDTA -> nat
Sumbool.bool_eq_ind : forall (b : bool) (P : bool -> Prop), (b = true -> P true) -> (b = false -> P false) -> P b
QArith_base.Qeq_bool_sym : forall x y : QArith_base.Q, QArith_base.Qeq_bool x y = true -> QArith_base.Qeq_bool y x = true
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.add_remove : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.equal (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.add x (FSetPositive.PositiveSet.remove x s)) s = true
Z.log2_bits_unique : forall a n : Z, Z.testbit a n = true -> (forall m : Z, (n < m)%Z -> Z.testbit a m = false) -> Z.log2 a = n
Nleb_double_plus_one_mono : forall a b : N, Nleb a b = true -> Nleb (N.succ_double a) (N.succ_double b) = true
MapEmptyp_complete : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), MapEmptyp A m = true -> m = M0 A
Neqb_complete : forall n n' : N, (n =? n')%N = true -> n = n'

``` 
intros d sigma H.
unfold dta_compat_check, dta_correct_wrt_sign in *.
destruct d as [p a].
intros H'.
apply predta_compat_check_complete.
apply dta_compat_check_correct.
apply H'.
```
